scripts.test:css: npm run build:github && find ./dist -name '*.css' -type f | head -10 && echo 'CSS files found above' || echo 'No CSS files found!'
scripts.test:css:vps: npm run build:vps && find ./dist -name '*.css' -type f | head -10 && echo 'CSS files found above' || echo 'No CSS files found!'
scripts.debug:build: npm run build:github && echo '=== Build Contents ===' && ls -la dist/ && echo '=== CSS Files ===' && find dist -name '*.css' -type f
scripts.debug:build:vps: npm run build:vps && echo '=== Build Contents ===' && ls -la dist/ && echo '=== CSS Files ===' && find dist -name '*.css' -type f
scripts.build:complete: npm run generate:pdf && npm run build:github
